org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc

接口 FencedMainThreadExecutable

  • 所有超级接口:
    MainThreadExecutable
    所有已知实现类:
    FencedAkkaInvocationHandler

    public interface FencedMainThreadExecutable
extends MainThreadExecutable
    Extended MainThreadExecutable interface which allows to run unfenced runnables in the main thread.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <V> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<V> callAsyncWithoutFencing(java.util.concurrent.Callable<V> callable, Time timeout)
      Run the given callable in the main thread without attaching a fencing token.
      void runAsyncWithoutFencing(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Run the given runnable in the main thread without attaching a fencing token.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.MainThreadExecutable

        callAsync, runAsync, scheduleRunAsync

    • 方法详细资料

      • runAsyncWithoutFencing

        void runAsyncWithoutFencing(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Run the given runnable in the main thread without attaching a fencing token.
        参数:
        runnable - to run in the main thread without validating the fencing token.

      • callAsyncWithoutFencing

        <V> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<V> callAsyncWithoutFencing(java.util.concurrent.Callable<V> callable,
                                                                      Time timeout)
        Run the given callable in the main thread without attaching a fencing token.
        类型参数:
        V - type of the callable result
        参数:
        callable - to run in the main thread without validating the fencing token.
        timeout - for the operation
        返回:
        Future containing the callable result
